attributes.action: Coronavirus daily updates concerning the rapid growing situation from the PM
attributes.additional_details: I believe we should be being told more about what's being done in our country to stop the spread of the disease. I believe that we should see the evidence that is based on their decisions. We shouldn't have to hear little bits from what they have said to the media but instead be addressed daily as we need daily guidance rather than days of not really knowing what will happen. Most of us can NOT just keep calm and carry on!
attributes.background: I'm calling for daily updates from the prime minister and his advisers to inform and reassure the nation with what plans are being put in to place rather than hearing bits of what's being done through the media

rejection.details: Since you started this petition the Government has introduced daily briefings.
